column38: EdgeR v3.24.013 package was used to normalize gene expression among all libraries and identify differentially expressed genes among samples with following constraints

column12: Cells were grown in culture media containing Sorafenib (2.5 μM) for three days prior to harvesting
column13: Cells were cultured for 10 days in the presence of tetracycline (no HBV replication) or absence of tetracycline (with HBV replication). Media was changed every 3 days and passaged if cells were confluent.
column15: Total RNA was isolated using Purelink mRNA Mini kit (Life Technologies) as per manufacturer's protocol, Libraries were constructed from total RNA using the Illumina TruSeq Stranded mRNA Library Prep Kit, Cat. No. RS-122-2101, RS-122-2102
column17: Data quality control was performed using FastQC v0.11.8, The RNA expression level in each library was estimated by “rsem-calculate-expression” procedure in RSEM v1.3.112 using default parameters except “--bowtie-n 1 –bowtie-m 100 –seed-length 28 --paired-end”.

column13: Cells were cultured for 10 days. Media was changed every 3 days and passaged if cells were confluent.
column15: Cells (5 x 104) were washed in cold PBS and lysed in 50 µl of lysis buffer (10 mM Tris HCl pH 7.5, 10 mM NaCl, 3 mM MgCl2, 0.1% IGEPAL CA-630). Following lysis and centrifugation, nuclei were used for transposition using Illumina Tagment DNA TDE1 Enzyme and Buffer Kit (Cat# 20034197) per manufacturer’s protocol. The transposed DNA was cleaned using Qiagen Reaction Cleanup kit (Cat# 28204), eluted in 10 µL elution buffer and stored at -20oC., Transposed DNA was PCR amplified using primers containing unique adapters. Amplified library was purified using Qiagen MinElute PCR Purification Kit (Cat#28004). Pairedend 2x50 bp sequencing was performed using a HiSeq2500 system (Illumina).
column17: Data quality control was performed using FastQC v0.11.8. Raw sequencing reads were mapped to hg19 using bowtie2.3.4.3 [2] with “-X 2000”., All other parameters were kept as default. Duplicate and low quality (MAPQ<30) reads are removed using PicardTools2.21.6, Differential chromatin accessible regions/peaks between DDX5 WT and KD were obtained using MACS2.1.2, peaks overlapped with the hg19 blacklist(wgEncodeDacMapabilityConsensusExcludable.bed) are removed, HOMER4.9.1 was used to annotate the peaks with their adjacent genes that were then subjected to pathway analysis against all biological processes from gene ontology (GO) using Matescape, The IGV tracks were made using bamCoverage from DeepTools3.3.0 with parameter “-p 3 -bs 5 --normalizeUsing CPM -- ignoreDuplicates” and visualized by IGV browser
